haircuts.title: Haircuts
haircuts.description: Various haircut styles for any hair type, from classic to modern. We help you find the perfect style that suits you.
haircuts.features: Precise lines, graduated cuts, textured ends.
haircuts.price: Prices start from 300 CZK. Depends on the length and complexity of the haircut. Contact us for a personalized quote.

coloring.title: Hair Coloring
coloring.description: From bold highlights to subtle balayage, we offer a range of hair coloring services that will leave your hair looking fresh and vibrant.
coloring.price: Prices vary depending on the coloring technique and hair length. Contact us for a detailed consultation.

styling.title: Styling
styling.description: Various styling options for any event or mood. From everyday looks to special occasion styles that fit any situation.
styling.features: Loose waves, sleek straight styles, evening hairstyles.
styling.price: Standard styling starts from 500 CZK. Special or evening styles may vary in price.

hairCare.title: Hair Care
hairCare.description: Comprehensive treatments for hair restoration and strengthening, ensuring your hair looks healthy and shiny.
hairCare.features: Deep conditioning, restorative masks, therapeutic treatments.
hairCare.price: Prices start from 700 CZK. The cost may vary depending on the products and treatments used.

specialOffers.title: Special Offers
specialOffers.description: 20% discount on any service for first-time clients. Special loyalty programs for regular clients.
